PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08772024-07-11ESDC, DIPD
ActAccessible Canada Act
PrecisAppointment of SARAH ÈVE DE LISLE of Gatineau, Quebec, to be a director of the Canadian Accessibility Standards Development Organization, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective August 26, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
